song.title: Voyager Golden Record
song.info:
Placed 6th @ Nectarine Scenecompos #28 ( Trip Hop Compo ). Composed with SunVox.
---
Carl Sagan "Pale Blue Dot" provides the vocal samples.
SunVox was used to pull it all together, but I wrote a lot of the stuff in a MIDI editor + soundfonts too, so I guess the moral is that I need to get a real workflow some time.
CC attributions: String bass samples by Carlos Vaquero Record noise sample by Joe Deshon
